note:
Deeply, irredeemably political!

Drifter, not a go-getter; but can very well sense where things are going!

Full of contradictions:
* very Indian and completely international
* love contemplation but restless and hyperactive
* act with rigour, intensity and passion, yet detached from the outcome

Would be happy to have all the luxuries and comforts, but do not want to work for them. The second part matters more, so have few comforts and no luxuries!
